p: Greenish yellow solid (yield 47%), m.p.: 203–205 °C, mass (EI): calculated for C20H15ClN4: 346 gm/mol [M+] peak, found fragmented peak at 316, 1H NMR (CDCl3, 400MHz, δ with TMS = 0): 8.46 (s,1H), 8.17 (s, 1H), 8.15 (d, J = 8 Hz, 1H), 7.97 (d, J = 8 Hz, 1H), 7.93–7.87 (m, 1H), 7.83–7.79 (m,1H), 7.67 (d, J = 6 Hz, 2H), 7.61 (d, J = 6 Hz, 2H), 7.54 (s, 2H), 2.07 (s, 3H).
